results.name: Permutation of nonnegative integers: a(1) = 0, a(2) = 1, a(2n) = 2*a(n), a(2n+1) = 1 + 2*a(A250470(2n+1)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1024
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: As a composition of related permutations:
xref: Similar permutations: A243071, A252754, A054429, A250246.
Differs from A243071 for the first time at n=21, where a(21) = 9, while A243071(21) = 29.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 02 2015
